dstAddr

public UdpPacket.Builder dstAddr(java.net.InetAddress dstAddr)
used for checksum calculation If the lower-layer packet is a IPv6 packet and the extention headers including a routing header, this parameter is that of the final destination. (i.e. the last element of the Routing header)

Parameters:
dstAddr -
Returns:
